# hasYawAngle

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether there is a valid yaw angle associated with the face.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasYawAngle: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the value in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataFaceObject/yawAngle] property is invalid and must not be accessed.

## Accessing the face detection data

- **hasRollAngle**: A Boolean value indicating whether there is a valid roll angle associated with the face.
- **rollAngle**: The roll angle of the face specified in degrees.
- **yawAngle**: The yaw angle of the face specified in degrees.
